successes.title: Star Trek Continues 2015 "Kirkstarter 2.0"
successes.description: Star Trek Continues is a successful award-winning, non-profit, fan-based webseries finishing the final 2 years of the original mission.

Pledges.description:
CREWMAN 3rd CLASS:
Our gratitude and thanks

CREWMAN 2nd CLASS:
PDF of one script (your choice of Episode 1, 2, or 3)

CREWMAN 1st CLASS:
PDFs of Episode 1, 2, and 3 scripts

CHIEF PETTY OFFICER:
PDF of first three episode scripts and Episode 4 downloadable poster

ENSIGN:
"Chief Petty Officer" level, plus digital download of first three episodes to your Mac or PC

LIEUTENANT JUNIOR GRADE:
"Ensign" level, plus early viewing of Episode 4

LIEUTENANT:
"Lieutenant junior grade" level, plus autographed photo of one actor (your choice: Mignogna, Haberkorn, Huber, Doohan, Imahara, Stinger, Lenhart, Specht, Dengler, Brown)

LIEUTENANT + BONUS REWARD:
"Lieutenant" level, plus one additional signed photo of a cast member (limited standalone reward!)

LIEUTENANT COMMANDER:
"Lieutenant" level, plus DVD of first three episodes

LIEUTENANT COMMANDER + SKYPE: 
"Lieutenant Commander" level, plus 30-minute Skype chat with your choice: Chris Doohan, Grant Imahara, Kim Stinger, Wyatt Lenhart, or Kipleigh Brown (limited standalone reward!)

LIEUTENANT COMMANDER + BONUS REWARD:
"Lieutenant Commander" level, plus TNG 1-5 ANNUAL CONCORDANCES by Larry "Dr. Trek" Nemecek from 1988-1993, as used by the TNG writing staff. This reward also includes a 30-minute phone call with Larry -- "Dr. McCoy" in STC episodes 1 & 2, and ongoing Creative Consultant. This entire set is in mint condition and autographed (personalized if desired) by Larry and artist Kevin Hopkins. (limited standalone reward!)

COMMANDER:
"Lieutenant" level, plus Blu-Ray of first three episodes (limited standalone reward!)

CAPTAIN:
"Lieutenant Commander" level, plus cast-signed cover page of Episode 3 script (limited standalone reward!)

LOWER REAR ADMIRAL:
"Lieutenant Commander" level, plus autographed cast photo

LOWER REAR ADMIRAL (McKENNAH):
"Lieutenant Commander" level, plus 30-minute Skype chat with Michele Specht (limited standalone reward!)

LOWER REAR ADMIRAL (SPOCK):
"Lieutenant Commander" level, plus 30-minute Skype chat with Todd Haberkorn (limited standalone reward!)

LOWER REAR ADMIRAL (NEMECEK):
"Lieutenant Commander" level, plus one-of-a-kind original, marked-up galley page proofs of the original classic 1992 "blue cover" STAR TREK: THE NEXT GENERATION COMPANION book by Larry Nemecek, "Dr. McCoy" in STC episodes 1 & 2, and ongoing Creative Consultant. This item comes from Larry's personal archives that can often be seen shared via his "Trekland Trunk" Facebook page and Twitter. Autographed upon request, if desired. This reward ALSO includes a 30-minute phone call with Larry on a Trek topic of your choice. (limited standalone reward!)

UPPER REAR ADMIRAL:
"Lower Rear Admiral" level, plus 30-minute Skype chat with Vic Mignogna (limited standalone reward!)

UPPER REAR ADMIRAL (DRAKE):
"Lower Rear Admiral" level, plus up-to-30-minute Skype chat with Steven Dengler AND a private flight in Steven's plane over Toronto and Niagara Falls (limited standalone reward -- travel and lodging to/in Toronto not included)

VICE ADMIRAL:
"Lower Rear Admiral" level, plus a pair of screen-used Spock ear-tip prosthetics signed by Todd Haberkorn (limited standalone reward!)

VICE ADMIRAL (MIRROR UNIVERSE):
"Lower Rear Admiral" level, plus the screen-used "Mirror Universe" Spock goatee (limited standalone reward!)

VICE ADMIRAL (ORION SYNDICATE):
"Lower Rear Admiral" level, plus Lou Ferrigno's screen-used mustache extensions from "Lolani" (limited standalone reward!)

ADMIRAL:
"Lower Rear Admiral" level, plus associate producer credit on episodes funded by this "Kirkstarter"

FLEET ADMIRAL:
"Admiral" level, plus walk-on role in an upcoming episode

FLEET ADMIRAL (MIRROR UNIVERSE):
"Admiral" level, plus the screen-used "Tantalus Field" prop from "Fairest of Them All," signed by the cast (limited standalone reward!)
